parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.82

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Positioning

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Switches mode of pixel precision (rounding) in a given control interface.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> control [[ctrlSetPixelPrecision]] mode

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> mode: [[Number]] or [[String]] - can be one of the following:
* 0 / "AUTO" - control position (x, y, w, h) is always rounded to whole pixels (game default)
* 1 / "ON" - control position (x, y, w, h) is rounded to whole pixels only when not animating
* 2 / "OFF" - control position (x, y, w, h) is always precise, no pixel rounding applies here

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetPixelPrecision]] 2; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Enables pixel precision of the given control</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlCommit]], [[ctrlCreate]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlSetModel]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[displayCtrl]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetPosition]]
</value></part></template></root>
